author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-1008. java: byte[] accessors throw NPE on unset field
This patch adds a null check to TBaseHelper.rightSize().

author: boisvert
msg: Add comment to help prevent future regressions

author: markt
msg: Extend thread local memory leak detection to include classes loaded by subordinate class loaders to the web application's class loader such as the Jasper class loader.
Based on a patch by Sylvain Laurent.
